welcome_message_body: Welcome to Yokohama, a city known for its beautiful waterfront, rich history, and vibrant culture. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring the city and taking in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Yakitori Akiyoshi (やきとりの名門 秋吉)
restaurants.description: Yakitori Akiyoshi (やきとりの名門 秋吉) is a yakitori restaurant located in 横浜市.
restaurants.address: 中区真砂町3-38 (キリン関内ビル 1F), 横浜市, 神奈川県, 231-0016

restaurants.name: Sisiliya
restaurants.description: Sisiliya is a pizzeria located in 横浜市.
restaurants.address: 中区相生町1-7 (和同ビル 1F), 横浜市, 神奈川県, 231-0012

restaurants.name: Asian Bar RAMAI
restaurants.description: Asian Bar RAMAI is a japanese curry restaurant located in 横浜市.
restaurants.address: 中区伊勢佐木町1-6-5 (亀楽ビル 7F), 横浜市, 神奈川県, 231-0045

restaurants.name: Katsuretsu-an (勝烈庵)
restaurants.description: Katsuretsu-an (勝烈庵) is a tonkatsu restaurant located in 横浜市.

restaurants.name: Izuhei (泉平 馬車道本店)
